title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description: Build cutting-edge security interfaces that help organizations visualize and respond to threats in real-time.
responsibilities: Develop responsive, high-performance web applications using React/Next.js
Implement security-focused UI components and data visualizations
Collaborate with security researchers to translate complex data into intuitive interfaces
Optimize application performance and security posture
requirements: Expertise in modern frontend architecture and state management
Experience with security-focused applications is a plus
Strong understanding of web security best practices

title: Associate Consultant - Offensive Security
description: Discover and analyze novel security vulnerabilities in modern web applications.
responsibilities: Conduct security research on emerging technologies
Develop proof-of-concept exploits and security tools
Publish findings and contribute to security community
Collaborate with engineering to implement mitigations
requirements: Proven track record in security research
Deep understanding of web application security
